question: How many flights depart from each continent during weekends (Saturday and Sunday) versus weekdays?
query:
SELECT a.continent,
       CASE WHEN EXTRACT(DOW FROM f.scheduled_departure) IN (0, 6) THEN 'Weekend' ELSE 'Weekday' END AS day_type,
       COUNT(*) AS flight_count
FROM postgres_air.flight f
JOIN postgres_air.airport a ON f.departure_airport = a.airport_code
GROUP BY a.continent, day_type
ORDER BY a.continent, day_type;
